# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.avi$
\.dat$
\.gif$
\.ico$
\.jar$
\.jks$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\..
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.pem$
\.png$
\.wav$
\.xcf$
\.xlsx$
\.zip$
^\.github/
^\Q.gitattributes\E$
^\Qlog4j-1.2-api/src/main/java/org/apache/log4j/helpers/OptionConverter.java\E$
^\Qlog4j-core/src/test/java/org/apache/logging/log4j/core/impl/Log4jLogEventTest.java\E$
^\Qlog4j-core/src/test/java/org/apache/logging/log4j/core/impl/ThrowableProxyTest.java\E$
_fr
